channel.title: github_trending
channel.description: Latest posts from https://github.com/trending. follow.is: None

item.title: n8n-io /n8n
item.description: Fair-code workflow automation platform with native AI capabilities. Combine visual building with custom code, self-host or cloud, 400+ integrations.

item.title: unionlabs /union
item.description: The trust-minimized, zero-knowledge bridging protocol, designed for censorship resistance, extremely high security, and usage in decentralized finance.

item.title: n8n-io /self-hosted-ai-starter-kit
item.description: The Self-hosted AI Starter Kit is an open-source template that quickly sets up a local AI environment. Curated by n8n, it provides essential tools for creating secure, self-hosted AI workflows.

item.title: ourongxing /newsnow
item.description: Elegant reading of real-time and hottest news

item.title: cyclotruc /gitingest
item.description: Replace 'hub' with 'ingest' in any github url to get a prompt-friendly extract of a codebase

item.title: rasbt /LLMs-from-scratch
item.description: Implement a ChatGPT-like LLM in PyTorch from scratch, step by step

item.title: DataExpert-io /data-engineer-handbook
item.description: This is a repo with links to everything you'd ever want to learn about data engineering

item.title: patchy631 /ai-engineering-hub
item.description: In-depth tutorials on LLMs, RAGs and real-world AI agent applications.

item.title: typst /typst
item.description: A new markup-based typesetting system that is powerful and easy to learn.
